rows.segment_description: The Intelligent Cloud segment includes public, private, and hybrid server products and cloud services that support modern business and developers. It primarily consists of server products and cloud services such as Azure, GitHub, Nuance Healthcare cloud services, and enterprise and partner services including Enterprise Support Services and Microsoft Partner Network. This segment focuses on cloud infrastructure, AI offerings, server software, and professional services to enhance productivity and efficiency for IT professionals and developers.

The More Personal Computing segment consists of products and services that focus on personal user experience with technology. It includes Windows OEM licensing and devices such as Surface and PC accessories, gaming through Xbox hardware and content including Xbox Game Pass and Xbox Cloud Gaming, and search and news advertising via Bing, Microsoft Edge, and Microsoft News. This segment aims to deliver consistent, personal computing experiences and expand gaming and advertising ecosystems.

The Productivity and Business Processes segment includes productivity, communication, and information services across various devices and platforms. It comprises Microsoft 365 Commercial and Consumer products and cloud services, LinkedIn with its Talent, Marketing, Premium, and Sales Solutions, and Dynamics products and cloud services including Dynamics 365 and low code platforms like Power Apps and Power Automate. This segment focuses on AI-powered business productivity, professional networking, and intelligent business applications.
key_products_services: Microsoft 365 Commercial products and cloud services
Microsoft 365 Consumer products and cloud services
